product.name: Color
product.description: Defines the primary color or pattern, such as blue or striped

product.name: Product certifications & standards
product.description: Indicates the certifications or standards a product meets, such as organic or cruelty free

product.name: Lip gloss effect
product.description: Describes the effect or finish a lip gloss provides, e.g. smoothing, plumping

product.name: Makeup features
product.description: Highlights key characteristics of cosmetics, such as high pigmentation or fragrance-free

product.name: Target gender
product.description: Identifies the intended gender for a product, such as female, male or unisex

product.name: Product form
product.description: Defines the format or presentation of a product, typically for health and beauty; e.g. lotion, serum

product.name: Package type
product.description: Defines the type of packaging for a product, e.g. jar, pump

product.name: Cosmetic finish
product.description: Defines the cosmetic finish of a product, e.g. matte, natural
